Title: N/A

reviewText: My son (and myself) both love the George series on PBS and the DVDs, but it really seems like the episodes are getting less enjoyable in the more recent releases.I think the earlier ones were much better (and cheaper since they're out longer).  I only really liked one episode on this one (the Igloo building one) and didn't care for any of the others.  Maybee kids still like them all, but for the parents who sit through them or just like watching them on their own occasionaly, I think the older ones are best.  And only get this if your a completionist and need to have every release.
summary: Episodes aren't as good as earlier DVDs
